verbs.description: it time for [ARG1: the church] to [V: grow] - up [ARGM-PRP: about sex] it time for the church to grow - up about sex look most all american pastors have officiated countless weddings where the couples were living together and having sex before they got married i ’ve performed some 90 weddings over the past 20 years and only 2 of them were couples who were not living together i highly doubt if my experience is much different from the majority of pastors be honest y’ all seminarygrad school boulder colorado university of colorado at boulder united methodist congregation martin luther prostitution jesus roger wolsey boy scouts of america catholic church
